General.Name: Climeon AB (publ)
General.Description: Climeon AB (publ) provides heat power systems. The company engages in the development and sales of Heat Power System technologies and related integrated control systems for recycling and conversion of low-temperature heat into environmental friendly and sustainable electricity. It also offers Climeon Live software, which is a cloud-based monitoring and control system for remote monitoring and maintenance of the systems; and consulting and support services for the Heat Power System; and consulting, service and support, and installation support services, as well as spare parts and training services. The company serves marine, energy, and industrial sectors primarily in Europe, North America, and Asia. Climeon AB (publ) was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.
